H0.text: What trade did both Dick Turpin and Butch Cassidy follow. Blacksmithing

H1.text: What trade did both Dick Turpin and Butch Cassidy follow. Butchering

H2.text: What trade did both Dick Turpin and Butch Cassidy follow. Saddlery

H3.text: What trade did both Dick Turpin and Butch Cassidy follow. Boning

A4.text: Robert Parker had a brief apprenticeship with a butcher in Rock Springs, Wyoming Territory, where he got his nickname (by the word 'butcher', which morphed later into 'Butch')
